parameters.name: NewResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the new resource group.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the hosted region. Call [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) to get the region ID.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource whose resource group you want to change.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The resource type. Valid values:

- Ipam: an IPAM instance

- IpamScope: an IPAM scope

- IpamPool: an IPAM pool

- IpamResourceDiscovery: an IPAM resource discovery
